name: Fusing Noracam
description:
Climb through the handwritten world to get the treasure located at the top of the mysterious tower.
The controls are movement and jumping, and sometimes you will transform to bounce, fly.
Overcome the fear of falling and despair and reach the top.
On the way you will hear several good music (it is also possible to turn it off)
There is no time limit. You can proceed at your own pace.


-Foreword-
Noracam has completed several adventures to obtain treasures, and her body was starting to melt.
Seeing that body, the town's seer asks him to go get a treasure from a tower.
The tower is located near the village, but it is said that it is not possible to climb it without a special body.
But if the body melts completely, it will become difficult to move, and it will be life-threatening...


-About operation-
It can be operated with a controller or keyboard (controller recommended).
Just move and jump(+something). The height of the jump changes depending on how long you press the button, and you won't be able to move if you jump without running.
And be careful, if you hit your head while jumping you will get a knockback.

You can also connect to the internet and climb with someone from around the world (α version)
